entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: FileLoggingProvider #59322
  • System.Text.Encoding.UTF7 property access should be disabled by default #59319
  • ClientWebSocket is ~10x slower on Linux #59314
  • [API Proposal]: Add time properties to CancellationToken #59312

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21463.12] grandnode item name change from Chinese (Simplified, China). Zh-CN to Chinese (Simplified, China). Zh-Hans-CN #59193
    6.0.0
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #54390
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore MSBuild_Logs/ directory #59323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Tests fail tests with NaN conversion #59321
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Fix IParseable/ISpanParseable NumberStyles for Single and Double #59320
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix debug build #59317
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HTTP2 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync should validate error code sent #59313
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix indentation in api prososal template #59318
    community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1369634 #59286
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [MONO][WASM] Changed wasmapp.LocalBuild.props to use net6.0 #59213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Work around for forbidden "Roslyn4.0" in test name on Android #59281
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59205
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Print "callsites by likely classes" chart in 'dotnet-pgo dump' command #59306
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] x64 on ARM64 fixes #59295
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
